AI Description: R Shiny is a web application framework for R that allows users to create interactive web applications directly from R. It enables data scientists to develop interactive, web-based dashboards, visualizations, and applications without needing to know HTML, CSS, or JavaScript.
Core Features: Interactive Web Applications, Integration With R Code & Packages, Responsive Design For Multiple Devices, Support For Various Input Controls & Reactive Output Elements, Customizable & Dynamic User Interfaces
General Tags: Web Application Framework, Data Visualization, Interactive Dashboards, R Integration
